SEARCH
Package org.opensearch.sdk

Class SDKClusterService.SDKClusterSettings

java.lang.Object
org.opensearch.common.settings.AbstractScopedSettings
org.opensearch.sdk.SDKClusterService.SDKClusterSettings
Enclosing class:
SDKClusterService
public class SDKClusterService.SDKClusterSettings extends org.opensearch.common.settings.AbstractScopedSettings
This class simulates methods normally called from OpenSearch ClusterSettings class.

  • Constructor Details

    • SDKClusterSettings

      public SDKClusterSettings(org.opensearch.common.settings.Settings nodeSettings, Set<org.opensearch.common.settings.Setting<?>> settingsSet)
      Instantiate a new ClusterSettings instance.
      Parameters:
      nodeSettings - Environment settings associated with the node. Currently unused on extensions, provided for code compatibility.
      settingsSet - The extension's settings.

    • SDKClusterSettings

      public SDKClusterSettings(org.opensearch.common.settings.Settings nodeSettings, Set<org.opensearch.common.settings.Setting<?>> settingsSet, Set<org.opensearch.common.settings.SettingUpgrader<?>> settingUpgraders)
      Instantiate a new ClusterSettings instance.
      Parameters:
      nodeSettings - Environment settings associated with the node. Currently unused on extensions, provided for code compatibility.
      settingsSet - The extension's settings.
      settingUpgraders - The extension's setting upgraders.

  • Method Details

    • addSettingsUpdateConsumer

      public <T> void addSettingsUpdateConsumer(org.opensearch.common.settings.Setting<T> setting, Consumer<T> settingsUpdateConsumer)
      Add a single settings update consumer to OpenSearch. Before initialization the update will be stored in a pending state.
      Overrides:
      addSettingsUpdateConsumer in class org.opensearch.common.settings.AbstractScopedSettings
      Type Parameters:
      T - The Type of the setting.
      Parameters:
      setting - The setting for which to consume updates.
      settingsUpdateConsumer - The consumer of the updates.

    • sendPendingSettingsUpdateConsumers

      public void sendPendingSettingsUpdateConsumers()
      If the ExtensionRunner has been initialized, send pending updates to OpenSearch, otherwise do nothing.

      This method should be called from ExtensionsRunner after initialization, to clear the pending updates.
